events.name: At the beginning of the scene

events.comment:
Delete web when:
- Left click is released 
or
- Hook point is is over 600px

In the variable FlyCount set the number of flies located on the scene, which will be used to track the mission
And set the value for the timer Cooldown. At the ends, a "defeat text" will popup.
Changing text position in center side of screen
Maybe change it to `Flies collected` from `Catch all the flies`

parameters: "CLICK and HOLD the 'LEFT MOUSE BUTTON' to throw the web"
